intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Dark Angels Space Marine chapter or any of its successor chapters.
strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Dark Angels detachments.

formations.name: Ravenwing Attack
formations.units: One Black Knights, four Ravenwing Assault Bikes, three Ravenwing Land Speeders

formations.name: Deathwing Strike
formations.units: Any four of the following units: Terminators, Cyclone Terminators

sections.name: Dark Angels Support Detachments
sections.description: Three Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Ares Siege
formations.units: Three Land Raider Ares, two Vindicators

formations.name: Devastators
formations.units: Four Dark Angels Devastators plus transport

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Four Predator Destructors and/or Predator Annihilators

sections.name: Ravenwing Aircraft & Dark Angels Swordwing
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations. One Swordwing Support formation must be taken

upgrades.title: Dark Angels Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace any number of Assault Bikes with an equal number of Attack Bikes

items.name: Deathwing Knights
items.description: Replace one unit of Terminators with Deathwing Knights

items.name: Strike Cruiser
items.description: Replace the Hunter Class Destroyer with a Strike Cruiser

items.name: Befehlshaber
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Choose one of the following options

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give all Aufklärers in the formation 'Sniper' on their Schwerer Bolter

items.name: Venegance
items.description: Replace four Ravenwing Land Speeder Tornado with four Ravenwing Land Speeder Venegance

usage: The EA-R Dark Angels list is inspired by the E-UK version of the list, but the differences are obviously way more numerous than the similarities. For example, while the Invulnerable Save on the Ravenwing formations has been retained, the Deathwing rule has been dropped, and the Teleport Homer rule is greatly expanded.

Apart from the rigid structure and the changes inherited from the EA-R Codex Astartes list, the most major difference is that it has no access to air assault formations, but strongly encourages the player to concentrate on the Teleport aspects of the Dark Angels fluff, and bringing a strong ground game. The Battle Barge has been replaced with the Hunter Class Destroyer, which provides the army with a cheaper way to use the Teleport Homer special rule.

A great number of the Dark Angels' many special units has been added, somewhat compensating for the loss of air assault options and Collegia Titanica allies. The Glaive, being a relic Horus Heresy technology, has been restricted to one formation for thematic purposes, while the normal Dreadnought loadouts have been replaced with the Mortis AA variant. The Land Speeder Typhoon has been replaced with the Land Speeder Venegance, and the formation reduced to four units to keep the cost down, and make the formation more competitive with the Aufklärer formation. The Assaults detachment was expanded to six units and comes with a Dark Angels Captain as standard (providing Teleport Homer), making them more relevant in a list without Thunderhawks. The Nephilim is now more similar to the Storm Talon, and the Dark Talon provides the list with a Fighter-Bomber option.
